name: Fried Bottle Squash
author: leeann5100
summary: Bottle squash is also known as calabash, oso squash, Asian squash, or by other names. Bottle squash is long, with a smooth, light green skin. This recipe can be used with green tomatoes, eggplant, summer squash, or zucchini. Just don't use frozen vegetables.
ingredients: 1  bottle squash, peeled and sliced into 1/4-inch rounds
directions: Heat 2 inches of oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat
Mix flour, salt, and pepper in a shallow bowl
Dip squash slices into a bowl of water; coat with the flour mixture
Drop a small amount of flour into the oil; if it sizzles, it is ready
Carefully lower some squash slices into the side of the pan furthest from you
Fry until light brown on both sides, flipping halfway, about 5 minutes
